item.title: Colleen add a quote by Anthony Robbins
item.description: "Live life fully while you're here. Experience everything. Take care of yourself and your friends. Have fun, be crazy, be weird. Go out and screw up! You're going to anyway, so you might as well enjoy the process. Take the opportunity to learn from your mistakes: find the cause of your problem and eliminate it. Don't try to be perfect; just be an excellent example of being human." -- Anthony Robbins

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Anthony Robbins
item.description: "Its not about the goal. Its about growing to become the person that can accomplish that goal." -- Anthony Robbins

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Anthony Robbins
item.description: "Success in life is the result of good judgment. Good judgment is usually the result of experience. Experience is usually the result of bad judgment." -- Anthony Robbins

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Tony Robbins
item.description: "People who fail focus on what they will have to go through; people who succeed focus on what it will feel like at the end." -- Tony Robbins
